level.heading: OPERATIONAL STANDARDS[COLON] USE OF AMPLIFICATION SYSTEMS (ยง 24-557)

level.text: No vendor shall operate a loud speaker or sound amplifier, or play a radio, drum, or other musical instrument as a means of advertising in such a manner as to create a noise disturbance, as that term is defined in DCMR Title 20, ยง 2799.
Activities open to the public and provided for in DCMR Title 20, Subsection 2805.2, are exempt from the limitations set forth in this section.
